manage.title: Labels
manage.description: Group hosts for targeting and filtering.

form.name: Label name
form.platformImmutable: Label platforms are immutable. To change the platform, delete this label and create a new one.
form.queryImmutable: Label queries are immutable. To change the query, delete this label and create a new one.

empty.title: No labels
empty.description: Labels you create will appear here.

newLabel.title: New label
newLabel.description: Create a new label for targeting and filtering hosts.
newLabel.criteriaHelp: Currently, label criteria can be IdP group or department on macOS, iOS, iPadOS, and Android hosts.
newLabel.error: Couldn't add label. Please try again.

editLabel.title: Edit label
editLabel.error: Couldn't edit label. Please try again.
editLabel.builtInError: Built in labels cannot be edited
editLabel.hostVitalsReadOnly: Host vitals labels are not editable. Delete the label and re-add it to make changes.

deleteLabel.title: Delete label
deleteLabel.confirm: Are you sure you wish to delete this label?
deleteLabel.profilesWarning: Configuration profiles that target this label will not be applied to new hosts.
deleteLabel.queriesWarning: Queries and policies that target this label will continue to run, but may target different hosts.
deleteLabel.error: Could not delete {{name}}. Please try again.

manualLabel.searchPlaceholder: Search name, hostname, or serial number

hostDetails.title: Labels
hostDetails.noLabels: No labels are associated with this host.

tooltips.hostVitals: Host vitals labels allow filtering by IdP attributes when your IdP is connected.
tooltips.idpConfig: To use host vitals labels, connect an IdP in Settings > Integrations > Identity provider (IdP).
